inn1.comm: gets some swing straightaway, pitches outside off stump and moves away from the left hander, Strauss lets it go
straighter line on middle and off stump, moves a touch away, Strauss defends on the front foot
wide outside off stump this time, and it doesn't move much, left alone to the wicketkeeper
short of a length on off stump, Strauss plays it off the back foot back to the bowler
fuller length but it's wide outside off, Strauss chooses not to play at it
fuller length outside off stump, it moves a touch away from Strauss who pushes forward at it and gets a thick outside edge to point
good length outside off stump, defended on the front foot to point
good length again but straighter line, dabbed back past the bowler for a sharp single to mid-on, England are away
tight line on middle stump, that pitched on a good length again, Strauss defends back to the bowler
loose ball, drifting into the pads, Strauss works it off his pads to deep fine leg where Pathan runs across and picks it up one-handed on the ropes
pushed on the front foot to cover
short of a length just outside off stump, Strauss goes on the back foot and defends back to Munaf
pitches outside the righthander's off stump from over the wicket and angles away, Bell lets it go
straighter line this time, that ball came back a touch and hit Bell, who got well across, on the pad, half-hearted appeal for leg before is turned down
short of a length outside off stump, Bell is quick to get on to the front foot and pushes it through cover
the first boundary of the innings and it's off an outside edge to the third man fence, Strauss slashed at that outside off stump but it went wide off second slip
defended to point, the batsmen think about the sharp single but Yuvraj's save sends them back
shorter in length but not short enough for Strauss's pull to come off, he gets a bottom edge to square leg
pitches on a good length outside off stump, defended with an angled bat to point

Munaf strikes! that hit Bell above the knee roll after cutting back into him from just outside off stump, the Indians went up in spontaneous appeal but Harper took his time before giving it out, it was perhaps a touch too high
defended on the off side on the front foot
short of a length outside off stump, Flintoff plays back and prods outside the off stump, the ball beats the outside edge and Dhoni collects on the second bounce
defended to point with an open face
short of a legnth outside off stump, Flintoff gets on the front foot and drives on the up straight to cover
short ball outside off stump, that bounced a bit higher and strauss tried to cut but missed it by a long way
straying on to middle and leg, worked off the pads through midwicket
fuller length, outside off stump, Flintoff defends confidently on the front foot
short of a length and that moved a shade bak into Flintoff, he waited for it and watched it all the way on to the bat

Pathan gets his first wicket! The ball pitched on middle and straightened, Flintoff tried to get across and play it on the leg side, he missed, the ball hit him on the knee roll and that's pretty plumb
pitches outside off stump and moves away from the left hander, Yardy lets it go
perfect line on middle and off stump, angling across Strauss from a good length, the batsman gets forward and defends to cover
similar ball, a touch straighter, defended back to the bowler
angling into middle and leg this time, played towards midwicket
pitches outside leg stump and hits the batsman high on the thigh, the ball rolls on the leg side
short of a length on middle stump, Strauss waits for it, plays back and defends
defended towards cover on the front foot
lovely delivery, beats Yardy comprehensively. that pitch short of a length and moved away a fraction outside off stump, Yardy got all squared up and the ball beats his outside edge
and again, this time it's a touch fuller and Yardy pushes forward at it but the ball moves away and beats the bat
fuller ball, pushed defensively through point
pitches outside off and shapes away from the batsman again, this time Yardy gets his bat out of the way
fullish length on leg stump, Yardy gets across and tries to flick but misses, th ball clips his boot and rolls towards short fine leg for leg byes
pitches wide outside off stump and moves wider, that's the first extra of the innings
full ball on of stump, Strauss gets into line and drives down the ground firmly, Pathan does well to get down and field
short of a length on off stump, defended to point on the back foot
fuller and straighter on middle stump, Yardy gets across and flicks it through midwicket, didn't time it well but he found the gap

the third batsman also falls to an lbw. That pitched on middle, held it's line, Yardy poked forward and played down the wrong line, the ball hit him just below the knee roll in front of middle and off, umpire Harper had little hesitation this time in giving it out
he gets beaten first ball, that pitched short of a length outside off stump, he should have played back at that but Pietersen came on the front foot and poked outside off stump
fuller and on middle stump, defended to midwicket
pitches on a good length on off stump, Pietersen drives on the front foot to mid-off for a quick single
pitches outside off stump and moves away, left alone outside off stump
straighter line on middle stump, defended back to the bowler
bounces from short of a length outside off stump, Pietersen tried to force it through the off side on the back foot but was beaten by the extra bounce
fuller length on middle and leg, the batsman gets across and tries to flick but doesn't make proper contact
that bends back into the righthander from outside off stump, defended on the leg side
pitches outside off stump and moves a shade away, left alone by Strauss
pitches short of a length on off stump and moves away from Pietersen, again there's a hint of extra bounce and Pietersen lets it go
and that one scooted along at shin height, it was outside off stump and Pietersen tried to defend but was beaten by the low bounce
defended back to the bowler
good length outside off stump, Pietesen angles it off the face down to third man, he's looking to get on the front foot at every opportunity
defended to point
full ball on the pads, Strauss whips it down to fine leg
short of a length on off stump, Strauss defends on the front foot
wider outside off stump and it rises a bit more, Strauss lets it go
fuller length, Strauss gets on to the front foot and plays a punchy drive but can't beat cover
angling into middle and leg, Strauss plays back at it and gets hit high on the pad, there's an appeal for leg before but that was missing leg stump
pitches outside off stump and moves away from Pietersen who lets it go
pitches just outside off stump and bends back into the right hander, Pietersen was late on the forward push and the ball hits high on the bat and rolls to cover
full ball and that swings back into Strauss who tried to play it through extra cover, he gets a thick inside edge on to the pad and Pietersen calls him through for a sharp single
shorter length wide outside off stump, Pietersen plays a one-handed slash down to third man and the batsmen run two, the throw was a poor one or the second run could have been tight
fuller ball and on middle stump, defended back to the bowler
short of a length outside off stump, Pietersen gets on the front foot and tries to force it through the off side, he gets a bottom edge
fuller length just outside off stump, Pietersen gets across his stumps on the front foot and plays it on the leg side
shorter length and Strauss tries to pull, he doesn't connect properly and the ball lobs up wide of mid-on

and Strauss goes too, short of a length on off stump, Strauss pushes hard at it on the front foot, trying to play through the line, the ball moves a touch away from the left hander, gets a thick outside edge and straight to Dravid at second slip
full and swinging in to the batsman's middle stump, Collingwood gets on the front foot and drives to mid-off
defended back to the bowler
pitches on off and middle and straightens in line, defended on the front foot back to the bowler
short of a length on off stump, Collingwood gets on the front foot and defends on the off side
dragged short and wide outside of stump, loose ball really but Collingwood is content to let it go
pitches short of a length, outside off stump and moves away from the right hander, Pietersen lets it go
fuller ball on midle stump this time, Pietersen presses forward and defends back to Agarkar
it keeps low again, Pietersen is playing everything on the front foot and that scooted low and past his outside edge, Dhoni collected it on the second bounce
defended on the offside on the front foot
shorter length and wide outside off stump, Pietersen frees his arms and lashes it down to third man
goon length and moving into Collingwood from outside off stump, defended back to the bowler
a half volley outside off stump, Pietersen leans into the cover drive and this it uppishly, the ball bounces short of cover
excellent shot, the first boundary off a proper shot. Pietersen moves across his stumps and takes the ball from outside off and forces it wide off harbhajan singh at mid-on, he timed that superbly
defended back to the bowler
he steps down the pitch and moves across his stumps again to whip it to square leg, Sehwag hits the stumps at the non-strikers end but Pietersen was home
left alone outside off stump
Pathan pitches far too full as he searches for swing, Collingwood pushes through cover but didn't time it well enough to reach the fence
good length on off stump, kept low as well, Collingwood blocks it on the back foot
fuller length on middle and leg, Collingwood steps down and works it off his pads through midwicket, Munaf and Harbhajan do the fielding
that was the offcutter, the slower delivery, Pietersen steps down and hoists it over midwicket, he seems intent on kick-starting a flagging innings
forced wide off mid-on again on the front foot, Munaf does well to cut it off
faster outside off stump and that bounced sharply, the batsman plays at it but gets beaten
left alone outside off stump
pushed to mid-off for an easy single
that burst off the pitch from just short of a length, squared up the batsman and took him by surprise
short of a length outside off, defended back to the bowler
this one keeps a touch low, on middle stump and Collingwood watches it intently on to his bat
Collingwood steps down the pitch to one that pitches short of a length, he ends up defending it
defended on the off side on the back foot
good length on off stump, Pietersen plants a foot forward and drives through the line but can't beat cover
Pietersen improvises superbly to move forward and across his stumps, he flicks that off his hips wide of short fine leg, Munaf gives up the chase once it's past him
steps down again and flays it though the off side, Raina dives across from cover and cuts off a certain boundary
he steps down yet again and tries to force it down the ground, gets a thick edge through midwicket
wide outside off stump, that's only the second wide of the innings
short and wide outside off stump, Collingwood cuts hard into the ground and Yuvraj jumps up at point to field it, Yuvraj winced a little as he landed
defended to cover
short ball outside off stump, Pietersen waits for it on the back foot and bashes it through the infield and to the cover fence
short of a length on off stump, Pietersen goes on the back foot and pushes it to point
Pietersen jumps down the track, Munaf saw him coming and dropped it short, Pietersen pushes it to midwicket where Dravid fumbles but concedes no runs
slower though the air this time on off stump, Pietersen stays in his crease this time and defends to cover

that's a huge wicket for India! No footwork at all from Pietersen, just stands in his crease and pushes away from his body at one that was short of a length and just outside off stump, it takes the edge and first slip accepts the easiest of chances
fuller length on off stump, defended on the front foot
full and drifting on to the pads, Collingwood clips it off his pads and Tendulkar fumbles at midwicket

dropped short of point and the batsmen go for the single, yuvraj races in, picks up and hits the stumps at the bowler's end. Unfortunately for him, the batsman was safe and the ball deflected off the stumps to the long-on boundary
drifting on to the pads and Collingwood eases it off his hips through midwicket, once it beat the infield it was a certain boundary
the third four of the over! This time it's off Collingwood's outside edge. He drove hard at it and the ball flew well wide of first slip
defended on the off side, fourteen runs off the over, easily the best so far for England
a huge appeal for lbw is turned down, that pitches just outside off stump and moves in a touch, Dalrymple gets forward and pushes, he got an inside edge on that or it would have been very close
flicked off his pads through midwicket
defended on the off side off the back foot
dropped slightly short outside off stump, Collingwood gets half forward, waits for it and square drives it to the point fence
in the channel outside off stump, defended to point
short of a length angling into Collingwood from outside off stump, the batsman gets an inside edge on to his pad
pitches just outside off stump and comes into Dalrymple with the angle, defended  on the front foot
carbon coby of the previous ball, Dalrymple defends again on the front foot
the straighter one this time, Dalrymple played for turn and was beaten
fuller in length on off stump, Dalrymple opens the face and guides it to third man
defended on the front foot to short leg
dropped short outside off stump, Dalrymple goes back and drives through cover, Powar gives chase and the batsmen run three
tossed up slow through the air outside off stump, defended on the front foot
floated teasingly on off stump, Dalrymple reaches for it and plays to cover
fuller length this time, driven down the ground to long on
pushed through quicker, by Powar's standards, on middle stump, defended on the leg side
this one's tossed up slower, Collingwood steps down but isn't to the pitch of the ball and gets hit on the pad
played back to the bowler
flatter trajectory on off stump, defended on the back foot
slower this time around, just outside off stump, defended on the front foot
middle-stump line, defended watchfully on the back foot
played with an angled face to short third man
fuller length on of stump, dabbed short of cover for a sharp single, Powar was the fielder and the batsmen took advantage of that
drifting on to leg and middle stump, played to midwicket on the front foot
tossed up on middle and leg stump, worked off the pads through midwicket
fuller length but again it drifts on to middle and leg, worked behind square for one
classical offspinner's ball, tosed up outside off stump, pitches and turns into the right hander who wasn't to the pitch of the ball, the ball hits him on the pad
defended on the off side
the batsman plays off the front foot but gets hit on the pad
swpet down to fine leg
on the off , pushed to cover
paddled fine from outside the off stump. Collingwood is in the Neil Fairbrother mode, nudging and pushing
floater on the off stump, defended off the front foot
tossed on the off, steered to short third man
on the middle and leg line, worked to midwicket
lovely offbreak that dipped in front of middle, Collingwood tries to turn it to on side, is hit on the pads
pushes it outside off stump, little slower and Collingwood is hit on the pads as he tries to paddle it fine
flatter delivery and swept in front of the square-leg. Previous he tried to paddle but this time goes square
comes down the track and chips it over infield on the on side
slow through the air, on the off stump, Darymple waits for it to arrive before driving down the ground
another one that is held back, arrives slowly, Collingwood just tickles it behind square
outside the off, on a length, Collingwood stretches forward to push it to cover
comes down to drive down but Raina, at midwicket, gets across to make the stop
again Raina comes into play
Nice little chip shot this time to go over Raina.
comes down the track and goes straight over Harbhajan. Didn't quite reach to the pitch of the ball but went through the line.
on the middle, turned to the on side
beaten outside off as he goes for a cut
fullish outside off, driven to cover
Ooh almost caught by Irfan at Point.  Went for a reverse sweep and almost hit straight to Pathan.
nice loopy offbreak, comes down the track and drives straight back to the bowler
floated outside off, square-driven to cover point
driven straight back to the bowler
comes down and hits straight to midwicket who is standing a bit straight.
swept past square-leg. England 100 is up
slower and dragged back the length as well. pushed down the track
comes down the track to push it to right of Harbhajan who makes the stop.
again uses his feet, Harbhajan floats it up and pushes it to leg side, Collingwood adjusts to flick it through midwicket
tossed up outside off, Collingwood tries to work it to on side, and is hit on the pads. Powar goes up in appeal but hit outside the line

Powar gets the nod from Simon Taufel this time. Collingwood comes forward - walks forward rather - and Powar again holds back the length and Collingwood tries to work it to the on side and must have got an inside edge on to pads before it popped up for Dhoni to hold a dolly.
floated on the off stump line, driven  back to Powar
Drama continues. Powar appeals for a caught behind as batsman attempts a sweep shot. Taufel negates it and it went straight off the gloves. Powar is certainly unlucky there.
landed on the off and straightened, pushed back down the track
full and on the middle and leg, turned to midwicket where Yuvraj swoops and has a shy at the non-striker's end but the batsman has made his crease
paddled away from outside the off stump, with the turn.

Chris Read tries to counterattack his way out of trouble and instead England now slip into deeper crisis. He went down the track and lofted a flighted delivery but got under it a bit too much and it sailed straight to Pathan at long-on
leans forward to defend it away
Well-flighted and extremely slow through the air. teasing the tailenders here. Mahmood is beaten on the forward prod and is hit on the pads.
outside the off stump, turned to the on side
loopy offbreak outside off, defended off the front fot
tossed up outside off but over pitched and Saj Mahmood drives it powerfully straight down the ground
goes back this time to push a regular offspinner to the on side
fullish on the off stump, paddled away fine.
slightly slower, outside off, pushed back down the track
slightly fuller, pushed to cover
landed outside off and straightened, Mahmood waits on the back foot and punches it past point
leans forward to a delivery on the length and defends it quite well. Head over the ball and all that Jazz
reverse swept fine! Sehwag makes a good diving stop to pull the ball from the ropes. Saves a run.
huge shout for lbw  and don't know why Taufel didn't give it. Maybe a inside nick. Landed outside the offstump and turned in sharply to hit him in front of middle and leg.

Harbhajan takes a damn good catch to end Mahmood's resistance. Powar tossed it up, Mahmood couldn't resist and flung his bat. It sailed high towards long-on, Harbhajan ran  ahead,  then judged that the ball is behind him, turned behind, took a few steps to his left and stretched out his hand. The ball landed in his palms. He had almost got perilously close to the ropes.
defended off the front foot
pushed to the on side
slow through the air and turned from middle, tucked behind to shortish fine-leg
pushed in flat and straight, defended off the front foot
doosra on the middle stump line, gets a leading edge as he works to the on side
beaten comprenhensively. Another one that went straight on after landing just outside the off stump.
just outside off, another doosra, didn't turn away sharply, steered to thirdman
leans forward to defend
slightly flatter and outside off, pushed to the off side
on the off and middle, pushed down the track
tossed up outside off, Dalrymple comes down the track and drives but the ball doesn't turn in all that much and he ends up going inside the line. The outside edge is smartly held by Dravid at slip.
pushes at a delivery on the length, gets an outside edge that takes the ball past the slop
Harmison attempts a reverse sweep but doesn't make contact. The ball bounds of Dhoni's legs and Dravid takes it
Powar makes the stop on his follow-through and under-arms it to disturb the bails. Anderson, at the non-striker's end, is caught just outside the crease.

inn2.comm: Full and just outside the off stump, steered to thirdman
He is beaten by a one that kept low. Luckily it was outside the off stump. Tendulkar makes it clear that it was low by stooping real low, as he normally does, after the ball went past.
leans forward to push the ball to the off side
it swung away and Tendulkar leant forward, checked his drive and punched it past point
full and outside off, pushed to the off side. It hits the bottom of the bat. Tendulkar has a careful look at the area of impact.
That wristy flick to a ball on the stumps but can't beat the square-leg fielder
Harmison starts off with what would be probably the widest delivery he has ever bowled. Went way way down the leg side.
slashed over backward point. Short and wide, room to throw his arms and he does it with glee.
Another wide
The pattern continues. Wide and then a four. This time whipped through the midwicket gap. Full and on the legs.
Yes yes another wide. This time well outside the off stump.
Harmison breaks the pattern! A wicket this time. Full and well outside off, Sehwag reaches for it but only manages to a thick outside edge to first slip.
upper-cut over slips, one bounce to thirdman. It was short and just outside the offstump, helped over the slips.
Lovely clip through midwicket. Full and on the middle, Tendulkar made sure his left leg didnt come across, leant forward and used his wrists well.
length ball outside off, Tendulkar leans forward to push at it, gets an inside edge that takes the ball to the on side. Finally, the over ends.
wallop. overpitched outside off, the front foot comes across, and he square-drives it past cover point
tickle. on the legs, turned to square-leg
drifted down the leg side
on the leg, tries to flick it to the on side and they rush across for a quick single. Tendulkar makes it just in time.
Bill Lawry would be a happy man if he were here. Lots of action. This  time a chinese cut. Tendulkar tries to force on on the up but it doesn't bounce as much as he expected and gets an inside edge
What a shot! Short of length delivery that climbs up just outside off and Tendulkar holds his balance and punches it on the up, through covers. Lovely shot.
leans forward to push a length-delivery to the off side
Harmison goes round the stump and drifts it on the legs. Pathan tries a flick shot, doesn't make contact and it runs off the back pad.
thrash. Full and outside off, sliced over point.
in the channel outside off, Pathan shapes up for a drive but lets it go through to Chris Read.
spears it in full and fast on the middle, Pathan tries to drive it straight but doesn't time it well, the ball rolls back down the track
hits the length around the off stump, punched towards mid-off
again on a length, punched on the up to cover
fullish and outside off, swinging away a touch, Tendulkar is out on to his front foot in a flash, goes down on his knee to drive it past cover
just outside off, pushed square to point
on the middle and leg, on a length, turned to midwicket
on the middle and leg line, Pathan works it towards mid-on, Tendulkar wanted a run but Pathan sends him back
around the off stump line, full in length, pushed to cover.
again comes on to the front foot and punches it to cover
starts off well. Length delivery in the corridor, left alone
banged in short, on the middle, Tendulkar hops up and behind to get on top of the bounce and tickles it to the on side
140.9 kmph delivery, just outside off, Pathan steers it to point
137.5 kmph delivery that landed short of length, on the middle and leg, turned to midwicket
108.1kmph this time. A slower delivery. Full on the off, driven to extra cover.

142.5kmph delivery that hurried Tendulkar and went through him. It landed short of length, on the off stump line and Tendulkar hopped up and tried to work it to on side at the same time. It flicks his back thigh and goes through to Chris Read
full and on the off, driven to short extra-cover
driven to mid-off. Not much power though.
Huge appeal as the ball crashes into the pads, beating a forward prod. Might have gone down the leg side. Delivered from round the stumps. Pathan seems to suggest he got an inside edge.
again hits him on the pads, this one is clearly going down leg.
Pathan had enough of getting rapped on the pads, jumps out and outside leg and attempts a wild heave but doesn't connect
going round is working for Anderson. So far ie. Again Pathan is rapped on the pads as he tries to work it to the leg side. His head is falling over a touch when he goes for that shot.
well-directed bouncer that sailed over the left shoulder of Tendulkar who ducks underneath.
flicks a length ball on the off stump, out to long-leg
hits the deck slightly short of length on the off stump line, Pathan is hurried into his defensive shot.
whack. slightly short of length, slightly outside off and cut past point.
on the stumps and Pathan respects the line by pushing it towards mid-off
attempts a yorker, length is perfect but the line is outside off. Pathan jabs at it but it squeezes under his bat.
Chinese cut to start off the proceedings after the break. Goes for a on-the-up drive through off, gets an inside edge
fullish on the off, Pathan presents the full face in defense
drifting down the legs, tickled off the hips
length delivery on the middle, coming in with the angle, pushed to the on side
leans forward to a length delivery and dead-bats it. Full face of the bat on display.
from wide of the crease, on a length, outside off, Pathan leans forward, left elbow high, and eases it in to covers
full in length this time, around the off stump line, Tendulkar is on his front foot this time and pushes it to backward point
Length delivery outside off, Tendulkar reaches for it on the up and sends it over short cover. Risky shot but he pulls it off.
beaten outside off. Drew Tendulkar forward with a length delivery that straightened and Sachin ended up pushing inside the line
well outside the off stump, fullish, Tendulkar goes back and across and tries to reach it but can't get a touch

Pietersen, who dropped a few catches in Ashes, pulls off a stunner. Pathan drives on-the-up to a length delivery outside off and Peitersen, at short cover, jumps up, both hands outstretched and comes down with the ball.
Dravid goes back, even as the crackers continue to burst and sky lits up with rockets, and pushes a length delivery calmly back down the track
It must be a ten-thousand wala. The crackers ie.. its still on as Dravid unfurls a rocket off his front foot. Driven through cover.
this time it is Anderson who celebrates Diwali . A short of length delivery outside off stump and Dravid pushes at it, away from his body, and the outside edge is snaffled in the slips.

Anderson serves a snorter to Yuvraj. It climbed throat high at Yuvraj, who takes his eyes off it, bends his head forward and it goes off the back of his shoulder and Strauss, at first slip, takes it. Meanwhile the fireworks continue. Is it a Indian or a England fan?!
length delivery outside off - perfect area to bowl to Yuvraj who, at times, pokes at em, pushed to cover
banged in short but is mis-directed. Goes slightly down the leg side and Yuvraj sways to his left
this time the short-pitched delivery is on target. On the middle and off, Yuvraj hops to punch it down.
135.6 kmph bouncer. The best one of the three so far. Climbs over the middle stump and Yuvraj sways away quickly
pushes this one full, driven to mid-off
beaten outside off as yuvraj has a tentative poke at that one. It also kept a touch low, and Yuvraj took his bottom-hand off the handle.
punched to point
yorker and catches Tendulkar by surprise. He is beaten for pace and is hit on the boot, but going down leg.

When Yuvraj's bat came through in front of his pad, one thought it was just a defensive push, may be the ball will roll towards the bowler but instead, this speds between the bowler and mid-on for a classy four. He checked his shot and just punched at it.
short arm pull past square-leg
Length delivery on the middle and off, Tendulkar goes back and clips it in style past square-leg
overpitched outside off and Yuvraj is on to it in a flash. Left elbow high and a great follow through and the ball screams past cover
beaten! He tries to repeat that stroke but ends up driving inside the line.
Shooter! 120.2 kmph delivery that landed on a length outside off and almost rolled along the ground.
banged in short and it sails over the left shoulder of Tendulkar who ducks under
slower ball, 114.3 kmph, fullish and on the leg and middle, tickled past square-leg
length-delivery outside off, punched on-the-up to mid-off
another short one, they are really testing Yuvraj with bumpers, swayed away. Taufel calls it a wide.
beaten outside off, Yuvraj has a slash at a delivery outside off but can't connect.
slower ball, around 112 kmph, picked early by Yuvraj who punches it into the ground and over extra cover
drifting on the pads, tucked through midwicket
full, fast and angling into Yuvraj from round the wicket, defended on the front foot back to the bowler
short of a length on off stump, Yuvraj stands on his back foot and tries to drive through the line, he gets an inside edge past his stumps
a yorker sears into Yuvraj's blockhole, he gets his foot out of the way and his bat down in time to dig it out
on of stump, defended on the off side
banged in short outside off stump, it's no where close to Yuvraj's body so he has no trouble in letting it go
fires it fast, angling into Tendulkar with the arm, he gets hit on the pad but the appeal for lbw is turned down
drifting down leg side, hits the pad and rolls to midwicket
defended back to the bowler
shorter ball defended on the front foot to cover
flat, quick, outside off stump, defended to the bowler
Yardy's round arm action angles the ball into the pads, Tendulkar flicks it through midwicket
short and very wide outside off stump, Harmison concedes yet another wide
short of a length and it rises on Tendulkar who gets up on his toes and tucks it to midwicket for a single
short and wide outside off stump, Yuvraj crashes it off the back foot but hits it straight to point
pitches outside off stump, bounces high and moves a touch away from Yuvraj who fends at it but gets beaten
drifts down leg side, Yuvraj moves across and tries to flick but misses, the ball hits the pad and Read collects
punched off the back foot to cover
tight line on off stump, Yuvraj gets his front foot forward and blocks it
zips through the air outside off stump, Tendulkar tries to drive but is beaten
full outside off stump, driven to sweeper for one
full outside off stump, Yuvraj meets it on the pitch of the ball and drives hard but can't beat the cover fielder
driven to mid off
a touch slower through the air, Tendulkar gets on the front foot and drives to cover
drifts on to leg stump, Tendulkar works it off his pads behind square for a single

that kept low, dead straight and hit Tendulkar very low on the pad even though he was jumping up to play it, pretty simple decision for umpire Harper to make, Tendulkar goes, done in by the low bounce
fast and furious just outside off stump, Dhoni pushes away from his body and the ball beats the outside edge
short of a length outside off stump, Dhoni plays back and defends to point
short ball, Dhoni defends it on the back foot and Yuvraj sets off for a single
short and coming in with the angle, Yuvraj stands tall on the back-foot and wafts it through cover point
defended outside the off stump
worked away towards the vacant square-leg region for an easy single, just 25 more to get
worked away with the spin to the midwicket region - Yardy bowling round the stumps to the right-hander
driven down to mid-off
driven off the back-foot, straight back to the bowler
slightly short and drifting down the leg side, Dhoni waits for the ball and at the last moment clips it down to fine leg for a brace
bowled from round the stumps, short and rising outside the off stump, Yuvraj leaves it through to the keeper, no-ball called for overstepping
wel-timed drive but straight to the fielder at cover
right up there in the block-hole, Yuvraj pushes forward to defend and the ball races away off the middle of the bat to the long-on fence - that's timing for you
another full length delivery, drifting down the leg side but Yuvraj fails to get bat on ball
defended outside the off stump
fuller and on the pads, driven straight to the fielder at mid-on
driven down to long-off
cut away off the back-foot to the deep point region
driven down to mid-on
punched off the back-foot to silly mid-on
slightly short, punched off the back-foot - well-timed shot but the ball goes straight to the fielder at cover
tossed up and turning in, defended on the front-foot
drifting onto the pads, turned away towards the vacant midwicket region for an easy single
bit wide outside the off stump, Yuvraj nicely opens the face of the bat and runs it down but fails to beat the fielder at short third man
defended on the back-foot
quicker delivery, Yuvraj is beaten for pace and the ball hits the pad, he got a good stride in and it was probably sliding down the leg side, hard to call
gentle loosener, drifting on to the pads and Dhoni nicely clips it away well in front of square leg, India inch closer
bouncer on the middle and off stump line, Yuvraj goes for the pull but fails to make contact
short of a good length delivery, outside the off stump and this one kept low, Yuvraj once again goes for the pull and this time he is beaten by the lack of bounce
tight delivery on the stumps, Yuvraj pushes forward and taps it way towards cover
another short ball keeps low! this time Yuvraj ends up with a bottom edge and the ball falls well short of the keeper
driven straight back to the bowler
driven straight to the fielder at cover
turning in from wide outside the off stump, Dhoni stays back and punches it down to long-on for an easy single
full and on the pads, driven hard and the ball gets past the fielder at midwicket
defended down on the leg side
pushed quicker through the air and Dhoni is beaten outside the off stump
defended stretching well forward - another quiet over comes to an end
another one stays low, ball clips the pad and rolls away towards square leg, pleading appeal for lbw turned down, just 10 more needed now
defended down on the leg side
and the game drags on - bit of width offered and Dhoni goes after it but fails to get it past the fielder at cover point
bouncer and Dhoni ducks under it
slow off cutter, Dhoni is beaten there, ball clips the pad and rolls away behind the stumps on the leg side
pitched up and angling across, Yuvraj stands his ground and thuds it past the fielder at mid-off, there was a second in the offing but Yuvraj settles for one
punched off the back-foot to the cover region, easy single
tossed up on the stumps, Dhoni comes down the track in an attempt to hit it out of the park fails miserably

that's the end of that! another wild swing and this time the ball goes low towards midwicket, Collingwood dives forward and takes a fantastic low catch, Dhoni gave it everything but failed to get under the ball
defended on the front foot

Dalrymple gets another one! bowled from round the stumps and close to the off stump line, Raina pushes forward to defend, ball clips the inside edge - crashes into the pad and rolls into the stumps, India are six down - is there a twist to this ending?
tossed up and turning in, defended stretching well forward
defended to point
full and straight, Yuvraj defends back to the bowler
drifting on to the pads, clipped down to fne leg for one, Harbhajan is now on strike
full on the pads, probably the attempted yorker gone awry, whipped down to fine leg
banged in short on off stump, it doesn't bounce as much and Yuvraj swerves out of the way
full, straight and fast, defended back to the bowler
pushed on the front foot to cover
pushed through flatter on off stump, defended to Flintoff at silly point
slower through the air on off stump, Harbhajan defends on the front foot
flatter ball spins back into Harbhajan who manages to keep it out
defended on the off side
fuller ball drifting on to the pads, clipped behind square on the leg side for one
defended on the back foot to cover
short and wide outside off stump, Harbhajan swishes at it but the ball beats the bat
and that's that! A half volley on the pads, Harbhajan flicks it wide of the fielder at fine-leg to score the winnings runs, the fireworks go off outside the stadium
